actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

official_title: A resolution to amend Senate Resolution 38, 101st Congress, providing for the appointment of a committee to receive and to report evidence with respect to articles of impeachment against Judge Alcee L. Hastings.

summary.text: Amends Senate Resolution 38, 101st Congress, to provide that the expenses of the committee to receive and to report evidence with respect to articles of impeachment against Judge Alcee L. Hastings, U.S. District Court for Florida, include the employment of staff and consultants.

titles.title: A resolution to amend Senate Resolution 38, 101st Congress, providing for the appointment of a committee to receive and to report evidence with respect to articles of impeachment against Judge Alcee L. Hastings.
